1855.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|98|101$لَا|"(Do) not|81|99|30$تَوْجَلْ|be afraid,|83|101|9795$إِنَّا|indeed, we|92|110|120$نُبَشِّرُكَ|[we] bring glad tidings to you|216|234|9796$بِغُلَـٰمٍ|of a boy|75|84|9797$عَلِيمٍ|learned."|78|78|8258$

1856.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|92|309$أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ|"Do you give me glad tidings|207|246|9798$أَن|although|77|116|655$مَّسَّنِىَ|has overtaken me|138|177|7057$ٱلْكِبَرُ|old age?|75|94|2407$فَبِمَ|Then about what|134|320|9799$تُبَشِّرُونَ|you give glad tidings?"|168|354|9800$

1854.verse: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."

1855.verse: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."

1856.verse: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"

1857.verse: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."

1858.verse: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"

1859.verse: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

1860.verse: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,

1861.verse: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all

1862.verse: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.

1863.verse: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,

1864.verse: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."

1865.verse: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,

1866.verse: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.

1867.verse: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."

1868.verse: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.

1869.verse: And the people of the city came rejoicing.

1870.verse: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.

1871.verse: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."

1872.verse: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
